Texto: 
bilateral varus derotational osteotomy
anteroposterior and frogleg radiographs of the pelvis show an increased apparent femoral neck-shaft angle with femoral subluxation.
coxa valga in cerebral palsy
spinal muscular atrophy, cerebral palsy, skeletal dysplasias
8 yo non-ambulatory male with spastic cerebral palsy
surgery is undertaken to maintain reduction of the hips for good sitting balance and prevention of pain and pelvic obliquity.
